text: Thomas Malone (born 1952) was an Irish hurler who played for club Kilkenny Championship club Rower-Inistioge. He played for the Kilkenny senior hurling team for a brief period, during which time he usually lined out as a forward. ==Honours== ;Kilkenny *All-Ireland Senior Hurling Championship (1): 1979 *Leinster Senior Hurling Championship (1): 1979 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Rower-Inistioge hurlers Category:Kilkenny inter-county hurlers
title: Tom Malone (hurler)
